data.description: Spectacular, four bedrooms, 2.5 bath colonial in highly desirable Gales Ferry neighborhood! This stately home welcomes you with a circular driveway and a dramatic, 2 story foyer. The entire property resonates pride in ownership, with gorgeous hardwood floors throughout and neutral palate. The eat-in kitchen is bright with center island, stainless steel appliances and large adjacent deck with awning, ideal for entertaining. The main level also features a large dining room, living room with a propane FP, charming family room with gas FP, a large light and bright 4 season sunroom and home office. The second floor offers 4 bedrooms. The primary bedroom has a renovated bathroom with custom double vanity, walk in shower, a huge walk-in closet and private balcony! Washer and dryer are conveniently located upstairs. The walkout basement is finished, perfect for a playroom, home gym or man cave! The home has central air, 4 zone heat and a large 2.5 car garage. Other features included on this beautiful professionally landscaped property are handsome stone walls, soaker irrigation system for gardens, putting green, gorgeous mature trees and beautiful views on a very private lot - adjacent to Avalon land Trust. Additional updates include solar panels, generator ready electrical panel, alarm system, central vac, newer roof and an inviting secluded hot tub on an attractive blue stone patio. Welcome Home!! Stop by , SATURDAY SEPT 17TH  11AM- 1PM
